Item 2.02 - Results of Operations and Fi.content: On April 15, 2025, Johnson & Johnson issued the attached press release (Exhibit 99.1) announcing its sales and earnings for the first quarter ended March 30, 2025.

Item 8.01 - Other Events.content: On April 15, 2025, Johnson & Johnson issued the attached press release (Exhibit 99.3) announcing that its Board of Directors declared a 4.8% increase in the quarterly dividend, from $1.24 per share to $1.30 per share, marking the 63rd year of consecutive increases. At the new rate, the indicated dividend on an annual basis is $5.20 per share compared to the previous rate of $4.96 per share. The next quarterly dividend is payable on June 10, 2025 to shareholders of record at the close of business on May 27, 2025. The ex-dividend date is May 27, 2025.
